title: SpaceX is now launching 10 rockets for every one by its main competitor
summary: In the meantime, SpaceX continues to build a massive launch tower in Florida.

title: Raytheon to acquire UK startup Northern Space and Security
summary: Raytheon announced July 18 it intends to acquire Northern Space and Security, or NORSS, a UK startup that specializes in space domain awareness.

title: US-UK special relationship deepens in space
summary: U.S. and U.K. space officials are discussing steps to strengthen their partnership. It's a conversation that has gained momentum in recent month due to concerns that satellites are becoming military targets.

title: UAE announces plans for radar satellite constellation and space fund
summary: The United Arab Emirates will develop a radar satellite constellation as part of a new fund worth more than $800 million to support the country’s space sector.

title: Firefly gears up for second Alpha launch
summary: Firefly Aerospace is preparing for the second launch of its Alpha rocket in late August or early September, hoping that a successful mission can enable a “step change” in activity for the company.
